title: Former House Speaker Hastert To Appear In Federal Court On Tuesday
teaser: The Illinois Republican, who served as Speaker of the House of Representatives from 1999 to 2007, will hear charges of withdrawing funds illegally and lying to the FBI. He's not the first high-profile Illinois politician to run afoul of the law.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
